name: icon-block-lucide
description: WordPress plugin that adds complete Lucide icon library to The Icon Block

scripts.build: cd dev/scripts && bash download-icons.sh && npm install --silent && npm run generate
scripts.generate: cd dev/scripts && npm install --silent && npm run generate
scripts.categories: cd dev/scripts && npm install --silent && npm run list-categories
scripts.validate: node -c register.js && echo 'âœ… JavaScript syntax is valid'
